description:

Most important is keeping yourself active.
healthy and natural food, Sunlight, meditation, daily grounding and DO NOT STRESS 🤓
(stress creates all sorts of problems and illnesses) breath deep💯
make an effort to find more laughter. cause laughter is healing your body as well as the placebo effect
